title: Who is a Paramahamsa? | Sri Chanchalapathi Dasa  @ChanchalapathiDas
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.key_quote: Unless one comes to the stage of Paramahamsa, one cannot experience Krishna Bhakti in its full form.
segments.summary: The speaker defines Paramahamsa as a stage of detachment from the material world, necessary for experiencing Krishna Bhakti, and applicable to all individuals regardless of their role in society.
